info: Rating, 5 stars,  · May 2024,  · Group trip
rating_comment: A friendly and accomodating host, was always reachable when needed. A gem considering the location.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · May 2024,  · Group trip
rating_comment: Mir is super amicable and friendly host. The house is nice and cozy with all the facilities as mentioned. During the stay, we never felt away from home. Warm thanks to the host for being available 24/7 and making us feel at home. We love to stay in this house again during the next visit.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · April 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
I had the pleasure of staying at an Airbnb hosted by Mir, and I must say, the experience was nothing short of exceptional. Mir deserves a resounding five stars for his outstanding hospitality. Communication with him was a breeze; he responded promptly and effectively to every query, making the entire process smooth and hassle-free. What truly set Mir apart was his willingness to go the extra mile—, he went above and beyond.
I liked the location of the house very much. It's 10 mins rickshaw distance from Dhanmondi - so you have access to all the good restaurants and cafe nearby. There are many shops for groceries just beside the house.
Next time I am coming to Bangladesh - will definately stay here.

info: Rating, 4 stars,  · January 2024,  · Stayed a few nights
Rating, 5 stars,  · October 2023,  · Group trip
rating_comment: We had a wonderful stay at Mir's place. The location is great, situated right in the heart of the city. It was incredibly convenient for us. The check-in process was seamless, and the gentleman who assisted us was exceptionally courteous. The accommodation was pretty comfortable, and my family really enjoyed it. We will certainly return in the future. Thank you, Mr. Mir.

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · September 2023,  · Stayed about a week
rating_comment: I extended and stayed for an extra 10 days. I felt right at home, wish I could’ve stayed for longer. And the Host, Mir, is an amazing person who’s always responsive. Great stay!

info: Rating, 5 stars,  · February 2023,  · Group trip
rating_comment: Mir is a wonderful host and I thoroughly enjoyed staying at the place. He was very communicative and took care of all our needs. The house is located almost at the center of the city so lots of eateries and shopping malls nearby. I will definitely recommend Mir’s house to someone who is looking for a good place to stay with ideal facilities. 5 star experience!

rating_comment:
Mir is very nice in person and always communicable. I was there with my family for almost a month. He tried to make me comfortable during my stay.
